article: It's September now. We are  _ to school. I am happy to  _   all my teachers and friends again .They  _ all fine. We are in Grade  _  this year. We are going to learn a new subject---physics   . I hear physics isn't easy. I am going to work  _  at it . I am not very good  _  math , but Wei Fang says she is going to help me . I think I can do  _ than last year. I like English very much .This year I am going to do more speaking. Zhang Hong likes English, too. But he needs help. I am going to help  _ . This term I am going to work  _ the wall newspaper .It is an interesting work and I like it . I'm going to do my best this term.
